about.introduce_about: Men .NET bakend dasturchiman. Agar sizga yangi vebsayt yaratadigan, mavjud dastur ishlashini yaxshilaydigan yoki eski kodni optimallashtiradigan mutaxassis kerak bo‘lsa —siz to‘g‘ri joydasiz!
about.experience_about: .NET backend sohasida 2+ yillik real ishlab chiqarish tajribasi
about.services2: ASP.NET Core va Entity Framework Core asosida backend tizimlar yaratish
about.services4: Unit, integratsion va acceptance testlar yozish
